channel.title: Vim on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Vim on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Creating an asynchronous plugin with neovim
item.description: ## I want to do asynchronous processing with vim Vim itself can not create another thread Do your best with vimproc + autocmd -Callback management is painful job/channel -You don’t know (good looks) remote plugin -Today this story Remote Plugin in neovim New features of neovim Start plugin in another process -Neovim is safe even if the plugin process dies! Mutual communication with msgpack-rpc (asynchronous) In principle, you can write in any language!
